data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Xuancheng, Anhui, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xuancheng, Anhui, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Xuancheng, Anhui, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next month to families who are far from God in Xuancheng, Anhui, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, purify the 212 believers in the county of Xuancheng to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Xuancheng, Anhui, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Xuancheng, Anhui, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,542, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Xuancheng, Anhui, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
